adDetails: show contact info Now booking 2013 Weddings & Private Events. Call for a quote!!! big or small, give us a call! Experienced, Professional & Ready For You!!! Specializing in Weddings, Birthdays, Sweet 16's, Quinceaneras, High School dances, Graduation parties, Corporate Events & just about anything. No event too BIG or small!!! I have thousands of music titles and counting! Including Hip-Hop, Disco, Old School, R&B, Freestyle, House, Techno,80's, 70's, Classical, Jazz,Cumbias, Banda, Top 40, Bollywood etc. I have songs before they come out on the radio! I carry edited (clean) music for your enjoyment. If I do not have your type of music, I will get it or download it on the spot! I can work with your personal playlist as well. If you need a contract or receipt. I have them! And I can also help you plan your wedding or quinceanera with my itinerary to make sure everything goes out as planned. My goal is to make your event fun and memorable for both you and your guests to have them talking long after your party!
